Sentencas: The layered perovskites NdBa 1-x Ca x Co 2 O 5+ delta (NBCax, where x = 0.0, 0.1, 0.2, 0.3, and 0.4) have been synthesized through a conventional solid-state reaction and examined as potential cathode candidates for intermediatetemperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC; 600 degrees C - 800 degrees C).
Titulo: Oxygen permeability and electrochemical performance of Ca-doped NdBa Co 2 O 5+δ in IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The Ca -substituted oxides exhibit a P4/mmm tetragonal structure and a phase transition to simple perovskite at x >= 0.3.
Titulo: Oxygen permeability and electrochemical performance of Ca-doped NdBa Co 2 O 5+δ in IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity in air at 300 degrees C - 800 degrees C and oxygen permeation flux of NBCax oxides are influenced by Ca doping content.
Titulo: Oxygen permeability and electrochemical performance of Ca-doped NdBa Co 2 O 5+δ in IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The activation energy for the oxygen migration process indicates that bulk diffusion is predominant at temperatures below 800 degrees C. X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy indicates the coexistence of Co 3+ and Co 4+ and oxygen -active sites on the surface of the NBCax oxides.
Titulo: Oxygen permeability and electrochemical performance of Ca-doped NdBa Co 2 O 5+δ in IT-SOFC

Sentencas: Variations in Co 4+ and adsorbed oxygen contents are related to the number of oxygen vacancies and are influenced by Ca content.
Titulo: Oxygen permeability and electrochemical performance of Ca-doped NdBa Co 2 O 5+δ in IT-SOFC

Sentencas: Among the oxides examined, NdBa 0.9 Ca 0.1 Co 2 O 5+ delta exhibits good electrical conductivity, high amounts of Co 4+ and adsorbed oxygen, high maximum power density of 1286 mW & sdot; cm - 2 at 800 degrees C in H 2 fuel in the La 0.9 Sr 0.1 Ga 0.8 Mg 0.2 O 3 electrolyte - supported cell, and low polarization resistance of the cell, as determined using AC impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Oxygen permeability and electrochemical performance of Ca-doped NdBa Co 2 O 5+δ in IT-SOFC

Sentencas: These findings suggest that Ca incorporation can improve the electrochemical performance of NdBaCo 2 O 5+ delta , rendering it a promising candidate for use as a cathode material in IT-SOFCs.
Titulo: Oxygen permeability and electrochemical performance of Ca-doped NdBa Co 2 O 5+δ in IT-SOFC
